title: At midday: TSX jumps over 8% as boundless Fed bond-buying fuels rebound - The Globe and Mail
description: At midday: TSX jumps over 8% as boundless Fed bond-buying fuels rebound The Globe and Mail View Full coverage on Google News
content:
Canadas main stock index jumped on Tuesday, as hopes of further stimulus measures from major economies, after U.S. Federal Reserve offered unlimited bond buying, helped shore up demand for riskier assets.
Although investors did not expect Feds measure announ… [+5615 chars]
